```{r}
#compiler - SST
library(dplyr)
sst_folder <- './sst/'
files <- list.files(sst_folder, pattern = '.csv')
#files <- files[1:5]

combined = list()
for (i in files){
  csv <- read.csv(paste0(sst_folder, i), header=TRUE, sep=",")
  temp <- csv[2]-1
  new <- cbind(csv[1], temp)
  write.table(new, file = paste0('./sst_low/', i), row.names=FALSE, col.names = FALSE, sep=",")}
```
